Pre-Game Insights: The Cubs have the ninth-ranked team ERA across all MLB pitching staffs (3.83). Rockies pitchers have a combined ERA of 5.43 ERA this year, which ranks 30th in MLB.
Cody Bellinger and Brenton Doyle are expected to deliver at the plate.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is at Coors Field, known for its high altitude affecting gameplay.
The Cubs are favorites with odds of -146, while the Rockies are underdogs with +123.
